name: Grobe Rode | Alpha Demo
description:
This is the Alpha Demo for Grobe Rode, a Kickstarter game. (Bugs may be present but these should only be minor if encountered)

Feel free to record your own game play or stream the game. 

The game can be played with both keyboard or a plug in controller. (Controls can be edited on start-up)

Roll into any hole on the title screen to start a level! 

The aim of the game is to wiggle around the map with Grobe, and Rode! Push objects off the map with your stretchy tube and grow larger as you push more off! Dont worry about falling off the maps, you'll come right back ;P

Grobe Rode can also be played Couch Co-op! Simply choose which end you and a friend want to control and have fun stretching together!

(if you ever get stuck, use the 'Squish GrobeRode' option in the pause menu)
